about_the_game: Hymns of Revelations reminds you of the new sacred duties available to you in the new expansion Monks and Mystics. Five new songs transport your soul to heavenly heights while you scheme and plot on earth. Composed and produced by Yannick Süß & Robin Birner (Audinity).
